messages.content: Hey! Welcome to {what have you done 2022 | bold italic}!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Another fulfilling year of spending time with your friends, huh?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: The other bots and I have certainly witnessed some incredible things!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Why don't we take a look at some of those incredible things you've done?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Let's get down to the brass tacks here: you all {really | italic} love sending messages.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: I count a grand total of {{messageCountThisYear}} in 2022 alone! Wowza! Compliments the bar chart quite well if I do say so myself.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Looks like YOU also had a piece of that message pie! A whopping {{userWordCountThisYear}} words making up a total of {{userMessageCountThisYear}} messages!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Adding this to the message-cakemix, you contributed about {{userMessagePercentageThisYear}}% of all messages sent this year!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: I hope your birthday was all you'd wished for this year.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Specifically, you made note of wishing for {{userWish}}. Traditionally, you're not supposed to tell anybody what you wish for, but here's to hoping it came true!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: How about I quickly roll up some leaderboard stats for you? Check these out:
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Well, it was pretty straightforward this year, huh?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Not quite the rollercoaster of polish from last year, but I'm proud of what I managed to scrape together!
messages.author: JermaBot
